name: posthog-url-normalizer-plugin
description: A PostHog plugin to normalize the format of urls in your application allowing you to more easily compare them in insights.

config.markdown: Normalize the format of urls in your application allowing you to more easily compare them in insights. The normalized url is stored in a new property called `normalized_current_url`. By default this converts all urls to lowercase and strips the trailing slash.

config.name: What should the property containing the normalized url be called?
